def_cn: (常指建筑物奠基典礼时放置的)基石,奠基石
def_en: A foundation stone is a large block of stone built into a large public building near the bottom. It is often involved in a ceremony for the opening of the building, and has writing on it recording this.

def_cn: (存在或成功的)根基，根本
def_en: The foundation stone of something is the basic, important thing which its existence or success depends on.
